name: Dear Diary : Howler
description:
Dear Diary
I still remember the first day I met him, he was clumsy, shy and warm.
I didn't think he would fall in love with a daredevil like me. He used “Howler” to flirt with me. That was crazy, because “Howler” was such a bad omen to me. Its high-pitched voice spoke sweet words.

It's not compatible at all.
But you know, what's crazier?
It's how I like his flirting trick.

I heard he consulted his friends on how to behave. To be with a daredevil like me. He didn't even realize that his friends were always telling weird ways. and sometimes teasing him.

But I want him to know....that he doesn't need to change himself. Just being a bit clumsy yourself, always smiling and giving warm hugs. That's enough for me to fall in love.

Alright!
What I want to say is today is a special day Because we decided to get together after learning each other for a long time. More than half of the people in the school said we were too different. But I don't care! 'Cause I know the difference will fill.

And know that I will live happily ever after with the man I love the most. even if it makes them shudder.
